statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore;
SELECT store_name, location, square_footage FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, energy_star_certified FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE square_footage > 5000;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, square_footage FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE energy_star_certified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE square_footage > 5000 ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, square_footage, location FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE solar_panels_installed = TRUE ORDER BY square_footage DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, square_footage FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE energy_star_certified = TRUE AND solar_panels_installed = TRUE;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, square_footage FROM GreenBuildingRetailStore WHERE location LIKE '%City' AND square_footage BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY store_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE energy_rating > 3;
SELECT store_name, energy_rating FROM stores ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT store_name, construction_material FROM stores WHERE energy_rating IS NULL;
SELECT store_id, year, month, energy_consumption FROM energy_usage WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT store_name, location, energy_rating FROM stores WHERE energy_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE construction_material IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT store_name, location, energy_rating, construction_material FROM stores WHERE location LIKE '%Square%' ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, energy_rating, construction_material FROM stores JOIN energy_usage ON stores.store_id = energy_usage.store_id WHERE energy_source = 'Electricity';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, material_type, energy_rating FROM GreenBuildingMaterials;
SELECT * FROM RetailStores WHERE store_location='New York';
SELECT store_name, store_size, energy_usage FROM RetailStores WHERE store_size > 5000;
SELECT measure_name, cost, estimated_savings FROM EnergyEfficiencyMeasures WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingMaterials WHERE energy_rating > 5 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM GreenBuildingMaterials WHERE material_type='Insulation' AND environmental_impact < 0.5
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage, MAX(store_size) AS max_store_size FROM RetailStores GROUP BY store_location ORDER BY max_store_size DESC
SELECT measure_name, cost, estimated_savings FROM EnergyEfficiencyMeasures WHERE cost < 10000 AND estimated_savings > 5000 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildingMaterials WHERE material_type='Roofing' OR material_type='Windows' ORDER BY energy_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM Store;
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product WHERE price > 100;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM Sale ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT full_name, position, store_name FROM Employee JOIN Store ON Employee.store_id = Store.store_id;
SELECT * FROM Store;
SELECT store_name, location, square_footage FROM Store ORDER BY square_footage DESC;

SELECT e.full_name AS Employee_Name, s.store_name AS Store_Name, p.product_name AS Product_Name, sa.sale_date AS Sale_Date FROM Employee e JOIN Store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id JOIN Sale sa ON e.employee_id = sa.employee_id JOIN Product p ON sa.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sa.quantity > 1 ORDER BY sa.sale_date;
SELECT Category, AVG(price) AS Average_Price FROM Product GROUP BY Category HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY Average_Price DESC;

SELECT su.store_name AS Store_Name, COUNT(su.sale_id) AS Total_Sales, SUM(su.quantity) AS Total_Quantity_Sold, SUM(su.total_price) AS Total_Revenue FROM (SELECT s.store_name, sa.sale_id, sa.quantity, sa.total_price FROM Store s JOIN Employee e ON s.store_id = e.store_id JOIN Sale sa ON e.employee_id = sa.employee_id) su GROUP BY su.store_name ORDER BY Total_Revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM retail_stores;
SELECT store_name, location, square_footage FROM retail_stores WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT store_name, energy_rating FROM retail_stores ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM store_products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT material_name, source, cost_per_unit FROM green_building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating >= 8;
SELECT store_name, location, square_footage FROM retail_stores WHERE energy_rating > 3 ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM store_products WHERE stock_quantity > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT store_name, square_footage, building_material, energy_rating FROM retail_stores WHERE location = 'New York' AND square_footage > 5000;
SELECT year, month, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE year = 2022 AND month = 6 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT material_name, source, cost_per_unit FROM green_building_materials WHERE sustainability_rating >= 4 ORDER BY cost_per_unit ASC LIMIT 3;
